name: React Native IDE
description: Spearheaded the development of a cutting-edge Integrated Development Environment (IDE) tailored for React Native projects, harnessing the power of MacOS development tools.

name: Appetite Connect API (FYP Backend)
description: Developed Laravel as the back-end tool with support from Sanctum, Breeze, Passport, and Filament to develop the API

name: Appetite Connect UI (FYP Frontend)
description: Developed Laravel as the back-end tool with support from Sanctum, Breeze, Passport, and Filament to develop the API

name: Appetite Connect Cashier Application (FYP Desktop App)
description: Developed the Cashier Application for Appetite Connect using Flutter Desktop for a seamless and user-friendly experience.

name: Personal Website 1
description: Created a personal website to showcase and display my online presence, with SMTP for easy contact system, and interactive UI with Framer Motion and Tailwind CSS.

name: Social Hive
description: Implemented Real-Time Texting, Image Uploading, and Profile Modification functionalities, with an admin panel for CRUD operations using React and Laravel frameworks.

name: AeroSystem CLI
description: Developed a CLI application to manage and automate the process of airline check-ins, with a user-friendly interface and a robust object-oriented system.

name: EcooCycle
description: The project harnesses the power of Vanilla PHP for server-side logic and integrates the Spline library to incorporate stunning 3D modeling into the web interface.
